Mixin Button

More Info
More Details
    @mixin moreButton ($color, $width, $height, $size) {
    border-radius:5px;
    border: 2px solid darken($color, 15%);
    width: $width;
    height: $height;
    background-color: $color;
    color: #fff;
    line-height: $height;
    text-align:center;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px #333;
    font-family: arial;
    font-weight:bold;
    font-size: $size;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.green-more-button {
    @include moreButton(#2E8B57, 120px, 50px, 21px)
}
.blue-more-button {
    @include moreButton(#4682B4, 100px, 30px, 13px)
}

Mixin Header

Header Section One
Header Section Two
    @mixin header ($color, $font)  {
    height:75px;
    width:0 auto;
    background-color: lighten($color, 30%);
    font-size: 25px;
    font-family: $font;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 75px;
    font-color:#fff;
    border-bottom: 4px solid darken($color, 20%);
    margin-bottom:10px;
    color: lighten($color, 70%);
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #222;
}

.red-header {
    @include header(#B22222, serif)
}
.blue-header {
    @include header(#4682B4, sans-serif)
}
